articles.description: It was in the year 2013 when Raveena Tandon became a producer with the film Stumped and during the making of the same, Raveen met Anil Thadani.
articles.content: Raveena Tandon ruled the 90s and made her place in both mainstream cinema as well as with author-backed performances. The star remains relevant today, having diversified into OTT space as well as in … [+2574 chars]

articles.title: Actress Earning Big Even Without Films.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Samantha has recently announced her decision to take a break from acting in films, citing her need to travel abroad for treatment to recover from myositis and improve her physical well-being.
